00040 struct SignalRegister {
00041     enum reg {
00042         reg1 = CTK_SIGNAL_REG1, 
00043         reg2 = CTK_SIGNAL_REG2,
00044     };

00193             ::ctk_dma_transfer(ls_addr, ea_addr, size, tag, MFC_GET_CMD);

00829             s_tagMask = 0;

00843 /* the single MFC instance */

00846 
00847 #if 0
00848 
00849 //#define DMA_LOOP_UNROLL
00850 
00851 template <unsigned int __N, bool _aligned = (__N % 16 == 0 || __N < 16), bool _large = (__N > DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE)> struct dma_op { };
00852 
00853 template <unsigned int __N> struct dma_op <__N, true, true> {
00854     static inline void transfer(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_addr, int tag, int cmd) {
00855         CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT(ptr2int(ls_addr)%16 == 0);
00856         CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT((ea_addr)%16 == 0);
00857 #ifdef DMA_LOOP_UNROLL
00858         ea_addr32_t ea_hi32 = ea_hi32(ea_addr);
00859         ea_addr32_t ea_lo32 = ea_lo32(ea_addr);
00860         DEBUG_PRINTF("DMA[%x]: [LS]:%p, [EA]:%x %x, size:%u tag:%d\n", 
00861             cmd, ls_addr, ea_hi32, ea_lo32, DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE, tag);
00862         spu_mfcdma64(ls_addr, ea_hi32, ea_lo32, DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE, tag, cmd);
00863         dma_op<__N - DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE>::transfer(
00864             int2ptr(ptr2int(ls_addr) + DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE),
00865             ea_hi32, ea_lo32 + DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE, tag, cmd);
00866 #else /* DMA_LOOP_UNROLL */
00867         ::ctk_dma_transfer(ls_addr, ea_addr, __N, tag, cmd);
00868 #endif /* DMA_LOOP_UNROLL */
00869     }
00870 
00871     static inline void transfer(void *ls_addr, ea_addr32_t ea_hi32, ea_addr32_t ea_lo32, int tag, int cmd) {
00872         CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT(ptr2int(ls_addr)%16 == 0);
00873         CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT((ea_lo32)%16 == 0);
00874         DEBUG_PRINTF("DMA[%x]: [LS]:%p, [EA]:%x %x, size:%u tag:%d\n", 
00875             cmd, ls_addr, ea_hi32, ea_lo32, DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE, tag);
00876         spu_mfcdma64(ls_addr, ea_hi32, ea_lo32, DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE, tag, cmd);
00877         dma_op<__N - DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE>::transfer(
00878             int2ptr(ptr2int(ls_addr) + DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE),
00879             ea_hi32, ea_lo32 + DMA_TRANSFER_SIZE,
00880             tag, cmd);
00881     }
00882 };
00883 
00884 template <unsigned int __N> struct dma_op <__N, true, false> {
00885     static inline void transfer(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_addr, int tag, int cmd) {
00886         CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT(ptr2int(ls_addr)%16 == 0);
00887         CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT((ea_addr)%16 == 0);
00888         DEBUG_PRINTF("DMA[%x]: [LS]:%p, [EA]:%x %x, size:%u tag:%d\n", 
00889             cmd, ls_addr, ea_hi32(ea_addr), ea_lo32(ea_addr), __N, tag);
00890         spu_mfcdma64(ls_addr, ea_hi32(ea_addr), ea_lo32(ea_addr), __N, tag, cmd);
00891     }
00892 
00893     static inline void transfer(void *ls_addr, ea_addr32_t ea_hi32, ea_addr32_t ea_lo32, int tag, int cmd) {
00894         CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT(ptr2int(ls_addr)%16 == 0);
00895         CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT((ea_lo32)%16 == 0);
00896         DEBUG_PRINTF("DMA[%x]: [LS]:%p, [EA]:%x %x, size:%u tag:%d\n", 
00897             cmd, ls_addr, ea_hi32, ea_lo32, __N, tag);
00898         spu_mfcdma64(ls_addr, ea_hi32, ea_lo32, __N, tag, cmd);
00899     }
00900 };
00901 
00902 #endif /* 0 */
00903 
00904 #endif /* __SPU__ */
00905 };
00906 #endif /* _CTK_SPU_MFC_HPP */
